column5: Fully furnished condominium within 15 minute or less driving distance from NRG Stadium/Superbowl, Houston Galleria, Museum District, Houston Zoo, and Hermann Park.  -Good location within short driving distance to major Houston hotspots with access to prime shopping, dining, and entertainment!  - Easy access to major Highway 59 and the 610 loop. - Quiet, gated, and friendly condominium community. - Great for couples, small groups/families, solo travelers. - Guest enjoyment is top priority!
